<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hwaddresssanitizerpass">HWAddressSanitizerPass</a></>}>
This is a public interface to the hardware address sanitizer pass for instrumenting code to check for various memory errors at runtime, similar to AddressSanitizer but based on partial hardware assistance. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hwaddresssanitizerpass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
